Classic example of “real” fake news. This rejection letter to Einstein in 1907 would have been written in German, not English. Plus, there’s an Einstein postal stamp in the upper right. No such stamp was issued until 1966 - over a half century after this “letter” was written. https://twitter.com/rjszczerba/status/1002746302638288897 …
The letter may be false but the underlying lesson to persist after rejection is inspiring. There must have been many Einstein rejection letters lost to posterity.
